channel.title: Need help with client so close to being online!
channel.description:
Hey,
right i have got a client and a source and as local host i can logg onto my server, so then i uploaded the client folder changin the localhost to my no-ip but when i downloaded on another laptop i couldnt logg in, on my main computer it regognised me trying to logg in on the run bat but it named me as 'null' i thought that i new what was wrong as iam on the same internet/ip i would have to change the laptop to LocalHost also but when i compile it i get 72 errors
[IMG]http://i616.photobucket.com/albums/tt250/Vengency_team_Gaming/help.jpg[/img]
If you cant view the image above then click the link below.
http://i616.photobucket.com/albums/tt250/Vengency_team_Gaming/help.jpg
I will be very grateful to anyone who can help me !!
thanks

item.title: Need help with client so close to being online!
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

where did you edit the local host?
becuase alot …maybe every client always needs to be edited in client.java and then another file like my other file is gui.java
and i dont kno your current problem here…sorry
